languages.text: Стрельба очередью позволяет сделать несколько выстрелов — их количество равно параметру {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g}, указанному в описании оружия. Во время очереди персонаж совершает несколько выстрелов, которые считаются одним действием с тегом "{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g}" — это значит, что на каждый выстрел действуют {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g}, работающие на одну атаку (но не на один выстрел). При стрельбе очередью вместо броска на попадание совершается {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверка{/g} на определение траектории выстрела. Выстрелы очередью автоматически попадают по первой цели, стоящей на их траектории — будь то враг или союзник.
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Rate of Fire{/g} characteristic specified in the weapon parameters. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, which are considered one action with the Attack tag — this means that each shot has bonuses that work for one attack (but not for one shot). When firing a burst, instead of rolling to hit, a test is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it an enemy or an ally.

traits.locale_text:
Стрельба очередью позволяет сделать несколько выстрелов — их количество равно параметру {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g}, указанному в описании оружия.
Во время очереди персонаж совершает несколько выстрелов, которые считаются одним действием с тегом "атака" — это значит, что на каждый выстрел действуют бонусы, работающие на одну атаку (но не на один выстрел). При стрельбе очередью вместо броска на попадание совершается проверка на определение траектории выстрела. Выстрелы очередью автоматически попадают по первой цели, стоящей на их траектории — будь то враг или союзник.

Стрельба очередью позволяет сделать несколько выстрелов — их количество равно параметру {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g}, указанному в описании оружия.
Во время очереди персонаж совершает несколько выстрелов, которые считаются одним действием с тегом "атака" — это значит, что на каждый выстрел действуют бонусы, работающие на одну атаку (но не на один выстрел). При стрельбе очередью вместо броска на попадание совершается проверка на определение траектории выстрела. Выстрелы очередью автоматически попадают по первой цели, стоящей на их траектории — будь то враг или союзник.

languages.text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.
languages.original_text: Стрельба очередью позволяет сделать несколько выстрелов — их количество равно параметру {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g}, указанному в описании оружия. Во время очереди персонаж совершает несколько выстрелов, которые считаются одним действием с тегом "атака" — это значит, что на каждый выстрел действуют бонусы, работающие на одну атаку (но не на один выстрел). При стрельбе очередью вместо броска на попадание совершается проверка на определение траектории выстрела. Выстрелы очередью автоматически попадают по первой цели, стоящей на их траектории — будь то враг или союзник.

traits.locale_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, bonuses that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to hit, a test is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

languages.text: Feuerst du in Salven, kannst du mehrere Schüsse abgeben ... die Anzahl entspricht der {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe. Beim Abfeuern einer Salve gibt der Charakter mehrere Schüsse ab, die als eine Angriffsaktion gelten. Das heißt, dass für jeden Schuss {g|Encyclopedia:Boni{/g} angewendet werden, die für einen Angriff (aber nicht für einen einzelnen Schuss) gelten. Feuerst du eine Salve ab, anstatt einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} zu würfeln, wird die Flugbahn des Schusses mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestimmt. Der Wert dieser Probe wird ab dem zweiten Schuss um den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Treffer{/g}-Parameter einer reduziert. Salven treffen automatisch das erste Ziel auf ihrer Flugbahn (egal, ob Freund oder Feind).
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

traits.locale_text: Feuerst du in Salven, kannst du mehrere Schüsse abgeben ... die Anzahl entspricht der {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe. Beim Abfeuern einer Salve gibt der Charakter mehrere Schüsse ab, die als eine Angriffsaktion gelten. Das heißt, dass für jeden Schuss {g|Encyclopedia:Boni{/g} angewendet werden, die für einen Angriff (aber nicht für einen einzelnen Schuss) gelten. Feuerst du eine Salve ab, anstatt einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} zu würfeln, wird die Flugbahn des Schusses mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestimmt. Der Wert dieser Probe wird ab dem zweiten Schuss um den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Treffer{/g}-Parameter einer reduziert. Salven treffen automatisch das erste Ziel auf ihrer Flugbahn (egal, ob Freund oder Feind).

languages.text: Les tirs en rafale permettent d'infliger plusieurs coups dont le nombre est égal au paramètre de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme. Lors d'un tir en rafale, le personnage tire plusieurs coups, tous considérés comme une action et identifiés comme étant une attaque. Cela signifie que pour chaque coup, les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui fonctionnent pour une attaque (mais pas pour un coup individuel) s'appliquent. Lors d'un tir en rafale, au lieu de faire un jet de dé pour {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} la cible, un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} est effectué pour en déterminer la trajectoire. La valeur de ce test est réduite à hauteur du {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}paramètre de toucher{/g} de l'arme pour chaque tir après le premier. Les tirs en rafale atteignent automatiquement la première cible sur leur trajectoire, qu'il s'agisse d'un ami ou d'un ennemi.
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

traits.locale_text: Les tirs en rafale permettent de décocher plusieurs coups dont le nombre est égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme employée. Lors d'une rafale, chaque tir est considéré comme une action et une attaque à part entière, de sorte que les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui fonctionnent pour une attaque (mais pas pour un coup individuel) s'appliquent à chaque coup. Lors d'un tir en rafale, au lieu de lancer les dés pour {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}atteindre{/g} sa cible, le personnage doit procéder à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} pour en déterminer la trajectoire. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de l'arme est retranché du résultat de ce test pour chaque tir après le premier. Les tirs en rafale atteignent automatiquement la première cible sur leur trajectoire, qu'il s'agisse d'un allié ou d'un ennemi.

languages.text: 连发射击可以一次性射出多颗子弹，射出的子弹数量取决于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}属性。 当进次连发射击时，角色会射出多颗子弹，但只会被视为一次攻击动作，产生一次攻击标签。这意味着每次连发射击时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果只适用于其中一次射击，并非每颗子弹都会获得加成效果。进行连发射击时，攻击者不会进行{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}掷骰，而是会进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定连发射击的子弹轨迹。首次射击之后，接下来每次射击的检定结果都会受到减值影响，等同于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}。 连发射击的所有子弹都会攻击弹道上的首个目标，不分敌我。
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

traits.locale_text: 连发射击可以一次性射出多颗子弹，射出的子弹数量取决于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}属性。 当进次连发射击时，角色会射出多颗子弹，但只会被视为一次攻击动作，产生一次攻击标签。这意味着每次连发射击时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果只适用于其中一次射击，并非每颗子弹都会获得加成效果。进行连发射击时，攻击者不会进行{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}掷骰，而是会进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定连发射击的子弹轨迹。首次射击之后，接下来每次射击的检定结果都会受到减值影响，等同于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}。 连发射击的所有子弹都会攻击弹道上的首个目标，不分敌我。

languages.text: Disparar en ráfagas permite disparar tantas veces como el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del arma. Al disparar en ráfaga, el personaje realiza varios disparos, y cada uno de ellos se considera una acción y un «ataque», por lo que reciben todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que se aplican a un ataque (pero no las que solo aplican a ataques de un solo disparo). Al disparar en ráfaga, en lugar de tirar para {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, se hace una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} para determinar la trayectoria del disparo. El valor de la prueba se reduce en función del parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}impacto{/g} del arma por cada disparo después del primero. Los disparos de la ráfaga impactan automáticamente al primer objetivo en su trayectoria, sea aliado o enemigo.
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

traits.locale_text: Disparar en ráfagas permite disparar tantas veces como el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del arma. Al disparar en ráfaga, el personaje realiza varios disparos, y cada uno de ellos se considera una acción y un «ataque», por lo que reciben todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que se aplican a un ataque (pero no las que solo aplican a ataques de un solo disparo). Al disparar en ráfaga, en lugar de tirar para {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, se hace una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} para determinar la trayectoria del disparo. El valor de la prueba se reduce en función del parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}impacto{/g} del arma por cada disparo después del primero. Los disparos de la ráfaga impactan automáticamente al primer objetivo en su trayectoria, sea aliado o enemigo.

languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, bonuses that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to hit, a test is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

languages.text: バーストすると複数発発射することができるが、その数は武器に設定されている{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}パラメータと同等となる。 バーストするとキャラクターは複数発発射するが、これは1つのアクションとみなされ、「攻撃」タグが付与される。つまり各ショットに対して、1回の攻撃（個別のショットではない）に与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が適用される。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}ロールの代わりに連射を行うと、ショットの射線の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}が入る。連射攻撃は味方か敵かを問わず、自動的に射線上の最初の敵に命中する。
languages.original_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. This test's value is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}hit{/g} parameter of a weapon for each shot after the first. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe.

traits.locale_text: 連射すると複数発発射することができるが、その数は武器に設定されている{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}パラメータと同等となる。 連射するとキャラクターは複数発発射するが、これは1つのアクションとみなされ、「攻撃」タグが付与される。つまり各ショットに対して、1回の攻撃（個別のショットではない）に与えられるボーナスが適用される。ヒットロールの代わりに連射を行うと、ショットの射線の判定が入る。連射攻撃は味方か敵かを問わず、自動的に射線上の最初の敵に命中する。

languages.text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Deviation chance is increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} parameter of a weapon and reduced by additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe. ! Note: Despite potentially damaging multiple targets and using pattern visualization, burst attacks are not considered area attacks!

traits.locale_text: Shooting in bursts allows you to fire several shots — their number is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} parameter specified in the weapon. When firing a burst, the character fires several shots, all of which are considered one action and have an "attack" tag — this means that for each shot, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that work for one attack (but not for an individual shot) will be applied. When firing a burst, instead of rolling to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} is made to determine the trajectory of the shot. Deviation chance is increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} parameter of a weapon and reduced by additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Burst shots automatically hit the first target in their trajectory, be it friend or foe. ! Note: Despite potentially damaging multiple targets and using pattern visualization, burst attacks are not considered area attacks!
